definition: time of day exactly on the hour (i.e. 12:00, 1:00 etc)/to make an inventory/(math.) point that has integer coordinates
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: A plane departs every hour on the hour.
The bell rings on the hour.
Does Radio Beijing broadcast the news every hour on the hour?
sentences.chinese: 北京广播台每小时整点播报新闻吗？

sentences.english: The plane departs every hour on the hour.
This is a whole area I get into in my free downloadable ebook on the website.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个整点我进入我的免费下载电子书的网站。

sentences.english: We show the existence of A-dilation wavelets for some non-expansive integral matrices.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了一类整点非扩展矩阵的小波存在性。

sentences.english: This is the whole point of a small-time program, it is the value of learning.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个整点报时的小程序，很有学习价值的。

sentences.english: The bus goes past the building on the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在整点时经过这幢大楼。

sentences.english: There's a train every hour on the hour.
sentences.chinese: 每小时整点有一班火车。

sentences.english: The hour strikes and the melody of hundreds of grandfather and cuckoo clocks rings out.
sentences.chinese: 一到整点，成百上千的落地钟和布谷钟齐鸣。

sentences.english: Also the whole point of earnest do not?

definition: it's time (to do sth)/the time has come
to draw a prize/a lottery/a raffle
lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
